--- create_vector_index_where_column_not_null.sql
CREATE VECTOR INDEX hello_vector_index ON hello(embedding)
WHERE embedding IS NOT NULL
OPTIONS(distance_type = 'COSINE')
--- AST
&ast.CreateVectorIndex{
  Create:      0,
  IfNotExists: false,
  Name:        &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 20,
    NameEnd: 38,
    Name:    "hello_vector_index",
  },
  TableName: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 42,
    NameEnd: 47,
    Name:    "hello",
  },
  ColumnName: &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 48,
    NameEnd: 57,
    Name:    "embedding",
  },
  Where: &ast.Where{
    Where: 59,
    Expr:  &ast.IsNullExpr{
      Null: 82,
      Not:  true,
      Left: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 65,
        NameEnd: 74,
        Name:    "embedding",
      },
    },
  },
  Options: &ast.Options{
    Options: 87,
    Rparen:  119,
    Records: []*ast.OptionsDef{
      &ast.OptionsDef{
        Name: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 95,
          NameEnd: 108,
          Name:    "distance_type",
        },
        Value: &ast.StringLiteral{
          ValuePos: 111,
          ValueEnd: 119,
          Value:    "COSINE",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE VECTOR INDEX hello_vector_index ON hello (embedding) WHERE embedding IS NOT NULL OPTIONS (distance_type = "COSINE")
